name: Education & Learning
description: Questions about education, schools, and learning experiences
author: IELTS Practice Team

questions.text: What subject did you enjoy most at school?
Describe a teacher who has influenced you.

card.title: Describe a teacher who has influenced you.
card.subtitle: You should say:

questions.text: How has education changed in your country over the past decade?
Do you think online learning is as effective as traditional classroom learning?
